channel.title: Forced Loading Please
channel.description:
Does anyone know how I could force loading on my server. I need to do this because whenever you climb stairs I want it to be forced to load so that everything around you isnt black. The only thing I've been able to come up with is it kicks you then reconnects or I have it tele you somewhere then tele back and have that height level. Please post any type of help you can lend.
Thanks, Moose
